name: frustration
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
short_effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.platinum: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
